scripts.prod:clean-install:calendar-tests: cd ./lib/calendar-tests && npm uninstall calendar-widgets && npm install calendar-widgets
scripts.prod:clean-install:developer: cd ./lib/developer && npm uninstall calendar-widgets && npm install calendar-widgets
scripts.prod:clean-install: npm run prod:clean-install:calendar-tests && npm run prod:clean-install:developer
scripts.pub:calendar: cd ./lib/calendar && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.install-npm: npm run install-npm:calendar-tests && npm run install-npm:calendar && npm run install-npm:developer
scripts.reinstall-npm:calendar-tests: cd ./lib/calendar-tests && rm -rf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm install
scripts.reinstall-npm:calendar: cd ./lib/calendar && rm -rf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm install
scripts.reinstall-npm:developer: cd ./lib/developer && rm -rf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm install
scripts.reinstall-npm: npm run reinstall-npm:calendar-tests && npm run reinstall-npm:calendar && npm run reinstall-npm:developer
